thought: To craft a polished_diorite, I need to first craft 2 quartz. To craft quartz, I need to smelt a nether_quartz_ore. I will first smelt a nether_quartz_ore from slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 12 with quantity 1
